education.area: Gateway to Health Informatics: an AMIA-OHSU i10x10 Course

highlights: As Subject Matter Expert for pharmacy on implementation of the new integrated Electronic Medical Record, I work closely with stakeholders inside and outside pharmacy to define requirements, map workflows, produce requisite clinical and non-clinical content, and drive integration efforts with other systems.
Manages enhancements, bug fixes, and testing of the Electronic Medical Record at Alexandra Hospital.
Extracts data and performs analyses that drive business decisions and policy making of the department.
work.summary: I partake in the transitioning from legacy IT systems of the 400-bed Alexandra Hospital to modern systems of 700-bed Ng Teng Fong General Hospital and 400-bed Jurong Community Hospital. The new hospitals feature an integrated Electronic Medical Record across all care areas and Closed-Loop Medication Management where every dose of drugs is barcoded and scanned before administration.

highlights: Initiated and oversaw usage of Mercurial version control system for the engineering team.
work.summary: Developed modules the Drupal-based core product, a cloud-based collaborative learning platform.

work.position: Google Summer of Code software developer
work.summary: Selected to receive grant from Google among 1026 students globally to work on the project Reactome-Wikipathways Round-trip Converter which was successfully completed, enabling rapid interoperabilty between the organisations.
